column4: I can't get certain CDs to be recognised by Ubuntu.  It just asks as though there's no CD in the drive.  I think this is only with bought CDs, like music albums and a printer install CD I have, rather than say home burned CDs.  They were recognised on Windows when I had it though.
After you insert the CD, wait a few seconds, run 'dmesg' in terminal, and see what it says at the end.
rather: getting a lot of http://paste.ubuntu.com/242001/  Is that wireless reference relevant to cd-drives?
